msg-nav-items.gallery: Discover themes, widgets and websites created by other users, and engage with the Weavcraft community.
msg-nav-items.pages: Create and edit your web pages effortlessly, with options to configure data sources, and add interactive elements.
msg-nav-items.themes: Customize the look and feel of your website with a variety of pre-designed themes and styles.
msg-nav-items.websites: View, manage, and customize your personal websites, including URL settings, and theme selection.
msg-nav-items.widgets: Manage and organize your collection of customized widgets for easy access and reuse in your web pages.
